points.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication
points.status: We use tracking tools so that: [...] We know whether you are reading our emails.

points.title: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data
points.status:
10. Your point of contact for any questions relating to data protection.

If you have any questions relating to data protection, please contact our Data Protection Officer in confidence.

SBB AG
Data Protection Officer
Hilfikerstrasse 1
3000 Bern 65
datenschutz@sbb.ch

Our data protection representative in the EU can be contacted at the following address

MLL Brussels SPRL
222, Av. Louise
1050 Brussels
Belgium
sbb@mll-gdpr.com

points.title: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
points.status: Your data will only be stored for as long as is absolutely necessary having regard to the purpose.

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
points.status: On swisspass.ch we use the web analytics service of the company AT Internet, based in France, in order to optimise the website.

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
You can retrieve an archive of your data
points.status: the right to portability in relation to your data.

points.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
Your data is processed and stored in a country that is friendlier to user privacy protection (Switzerland)
points.status: Your data are stored in Switzerland.

points.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection (Switzerland).
points.status: The courts at the registered office of SBB AG in Berne have sole jurisdiction over any disputes arising between you as visitor to and user of swisspass.ch, and SBB AG. Swiss law shall apply exclusively.

points.title: This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites
points.status: We accept no responsibility for the correctness, completeness or lawfulness of the content of these websites or of any links to further websites, nor for any offers, products or services contained therein.
